comment: Lemma for defining an emulation of Hilbert's epsilon. Hilbert's epsilon is described at ~ http://plato.stanford.edu/entries/epsilon-calculus/ . This theorem is equivalent to Hilbert's "transfinite axiom", described on that page, with the additional ` R We A ` antecedent. The element ` B ` is the epsilon that the theorem emulates. (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2015.)
